titles.title: To amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide authority for the transfer of forfeited property to State and local fire departments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Controlled Substances Act to provide authority for the transfer of forfeited property under such Act to State and local fire departments.
